#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>

int comp( void const *a, void const *b)
{
	return (*(int *)a - *(int *)b);
}

int main()
{
	int foo[100009];
	int N, T, i;

	scanf("%d", &T);

	while (T--)
	{
		scanf("%d", &N);
		for (i = 0; i < N; i++)
				scanf("%d", &foo[i]);

		if (N % 2 == 0)
			printf("-1\n");
		else if (N == 1)
		{
			printf("%d\n", foo[0]);
		}

		else
		{
			qsort(foo, N, sizeof(int), comp);

			if (foo[N / 2] > foo[N / 2 - 1] && foo[N / 2] < foo[N / 2 + 1])
				printf("%d\n", foo[N / 2]);
			else
				printf("-1\n");
		}
	}

	return 0;
}
